value:
$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|Ah, you have returned with my Ár...
I once again have my full power at
my disposal. Well done, Seiðr.$k$pNow bow your head, and I shall
grant you the power of my light.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes...$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$Fi1500|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|I can feel the light's warmth
within me.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|The light you have been given
will serve to guide you.$k$pFollow its guidance to Vanaheimr's
Light Temple and perform the rite.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|The Rite of Light...$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|Our foe, the Golden Seer Gullveig,
has used her power to manipulate
time to build up infinite might.$k$pThis Gullveig, who makes her home
at the far edge of eternity, cannot
be defeated by any force.$k$pSo...what hope do we have?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$pWe need to defeat her...before she
can amass so much strength.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|Aha... Sharp for a mortal.$k$pIt is indeed true that no matter how
great one becomes, at birth, no one
is more than a baby.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If there's a Gullveig in the future,
then there's a Gullveig of the present.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|Now you must perform the rite and
find the seer in the present, before
she grows too powerful to stop.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Yes, King Njörðr.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|And Seiðr, with regard to the other
task I asked of you...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-yes. It will be done. I promise,
for Vanaheimr.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|I am relying on you, Seiðr.$k$p

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|We're about to head inside, Heiðr.
I promise we will return to you soon.
Please wait here while we're gone.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face|Of course... I will not beg you to take
me any farther. I will remain here and
pray for your safe return.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Let us go then, children of Midgard.
We must make use of this power
King Njörðr has given to me.$k$pAs a goddess of Vanaheimr, I must
perform my duties as best I am able.
Now, follow me...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Do you have a moment? I was hoping
to speak with you about something
important, $Nu...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Please keep an open mind about
what I'm about to tell you. Do not
rush to any conclusions...$k$pThis was a request from King Njörðr
and is all for the long-term prosperity
of Vanaheimr, and well...$k$p$EFace_Blush2|To come right out and say it...$k$pWould you create a child with me?$k$pB-before you answer, I should be
clear: the ritual is not like what you
might be expecting!$k$pGoddesses are able to create a child
with a mortal, yes, but the ceremony
around the creation is much different!$k$pSuch a child is not made of the flesh,
but of the soul... A vow made to the
goddess is all it takes.$k$pThe child would not grow within
me either...$k$pSome time after the vow has been
made to the goddess, the child will
appear within the light of Vanaheimr.$k$pAfter the ritual, nothing further is
required from the mortal, so you
need not think anything more of it!$k$p$EFace_Pain|I know you and I have only just met...
I cannot claim to understand it all.
But even in our short time together...$k$p$EFace|I still feel as if...we have known each
other a very long time.$k$p$EFace_Blush2|I of course do not make this request
of you lightly—and doing so is in no
way easy for me...$k$pHowever, if I must choose someone
with whom I might create a child,
I thought...you'd be the right choice.$k$pThere was no one I would choose
over you, if I am to be honest...$k$pSo, do you...accept?$k$p$Sbs150|
